name: Maji Mag Cover #08
description:
Maji Mag went through a transformation and entered the world of NFT after 9 years. We published 19 issues as a digital magazine between 2007-2012. We wanted to transform the covers of these 19 issues, which we think have a historical value, into NFT and bring them to the present.

We want Maji Mag to create a series of cultural attractions that celebrate the visionary philosophy of art, philosophy and imagination. Standing in solidarity with the past, Maji Mag seeks to learn from the wisdom of traditional cultures and creates visuals that show that we are not passive spectators in a feast of archaic knowledge.

Each cover will be published for 1 week. Unsold NFTs will be burned!
Buy the covers, get the PDF! (This issue is only in Turkish.)  

This issue's publication date is December 2008.
